attributes.action: Provide interest payments to each of the UK Tax Paying citizens who have, in effect, loaned Northern Rock ~£1000 each
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Government, by providing Northern Rock with a £30B Guaranteed "Loan", has, in effect reversed the policy that thr NR institution uses with it's customers, but on an interest free basis.  As I presonally have ~£1000 of my tax paying money guaranteed to protect NR, I believe all UK tax payers are due interest payment on that loan from NR.  This is merely adhering to the standard money lender policy that they employ.
